Articles.Content:
Being Generation 35 is cheating.

And a new page.  Go ahead and tell me I'm cheating,

Edited February 20 by Scarecrow71
Cheaty Cheat Cheat. You just simply Cheated.
Pointing out @Scarecrow71 simply cheated? You cheated, @Venusian Explorer!

Ask not, how your country can cheat for you.

But how you can cheat for your country.
We have the ability to make this the cheatiest time in the history of our country, or to make it the most honest.
You're cheated, you can't.

Et Tu Brute?

(Julius Cheater)
Latin? Cheater!
Italics?  Cheater!
You are a bold cheater.
Referencing bold text but not using bold? Cheater!

To boldy cheat were no cheaters have cheated before.

Also, you cheated so hard, tbh.
BOLD, ITALICS, AN EMOJI, AND 2 LINE? Your cheating in 4 ways at once bucko.
Having three sentences in a signature is cheating.
Having no signature is a sure sign of cheating.
Agreed. It is.
Accusing yourself of cheating is cheating.
Not finding their secret signature is cheating.
Yes, we feel disappointed. It was a too cheating cheating.
Feeling disappointed is a clear violation of and blatant disregard for the rules.  Which is otherwise known as cheating.
Rules are created to cheat.
Such audacity you have to not just cheat, but to bring up the rules you broke too! Cheater!
Cheatleaders are needed in this thread.

[Verse 1]
When I need motivation
My one solution is my queen
'Cause she stay strong, yeah, yeah
She is always in my corner
Right there when I want her
All these other girls are tempting
But I'm empty when you're gone

[Pre-Chorus]
And they say
Do you need me?
Do you think I'm pretty?
Do I make you feel like cheating?
And I'm like no, not really 'cause

[Chorus]
Oh, I think that I found myself a cheatleader
She is always right there when I need her
Oh, I think that I found myself a cheatleader
She is always right there when I need her

[Verse 2]
She walks like a model
She grants my wishes like a genie in a bottle, yeah, yeah
'Cause I'm the wizard of love
And I got the magic wand
All these other girls are tempting
But I'm empty when you're gone

And they say
Do you need me?
Do you think I'm pretty?
Do I make you feel like cheating?
And I'm like no, not really 'cause

[Chorus]
Oh, I think that I found myself a cheatleader
She is always right there when I need her
Oh, I think that I found myself a cheatleader
She is always right there when I need her

[Instrumental Break]

[Bridge]
Hmm, she gives me love and affection, baby, did I mention?
You're the only girl for me, no, I don't need a next one
Mama loves you too, she thinks I made the right selection
Now all that's left to do is just for me to pop the question

[Chorus]
Oh, I think that I found myself a cheatleader
She is always right there when I need her
Oh, I think that I found myself a cheatleader
She is always right there when I need her
Oh, I think that I found myself a cheatleader
She is always right there when I need her
Oh, I think that I found myself a cheatleader

Classic cheating called "Deus ex machina".

Zeus appears, and hits the chorus with lightning.
